import React from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import classes from './Post.module.css' const img="https://images.pexels.com/photos/3408744/pexels-photo-3408744.jpeg?auto=compress&cs=tinysrgb&dpr=2&h=650&w=940" const Posts = ({post}) => { return (
Music Life
{post.title}
{new Date(post.createdAt).toDateString()}

{post.description}

) } export default Posts
